name: The Flying Helmet
description:
Co-op tavern managment game where you serve beer and food to hungry vikings. 
The inn fills up very quickly so get rid of drunk customers by throwing them out the window!

Controls:
Space / Start (game pad) - spawn
WASD / left joystick - character movement
E / Bottom button on right face (game pad) - interact with most objects (beer pourer, giving drinks)
R / Left or Right button on right face - pick up plates and vikings 

Features:

  • Ragdolled vikings after passing out
  • Throwing clients out the window
  • Up to 4 players couch co-op
  • Randomised vikings looks
